title: Summary & Study Guide The Mote in God's Eye by Larry Niven
description: The Mote in God's Eye Study Guide consists of approx. 68 pages of summaries and analysis on The Mote in God's Eye by Larry Niven. This study guide includes the following Plot Summary, Chapter Summaries & Analysis, Characters, Objects/Places, Themes, Style, Quotes, and Topics for Discussion.
author: BookRags
